name: Mikuya
description:
Training:

Kohya GUI, 40 Images, 100 per, 4000 total.

You are responsible for the images created by you. Unethical usage of this LORA is prohibited.

I will temporarily allow this model to be publicly displayed in order to discuss working methods with everyone. I strongly advise against uploading any NSFW generated by this model. I warmly welcome you to communicate with me here on how to improve the working method to make the model more realistic. I am currently considering how to generate a better version 2.0. If you have any suggestions, such as choosing different base models, training with more images, increasing the number of training steps, or changing the training size to achieve a more realistic overall effect, please feel free to leave a comment below.

我会暂时让这个模型公开展示，为了和各位讨论工作方法，强烈不建议您在此上传用这个模型生成的NSFW，非常欢迎您在此与我交流如何更好地改进工作方法来让模型更逼真，我近期在考虑如何生成更好的2.0版本，如果您有建议，比如通过选择不同的基底模型、用更多的图片训练、增加训练步数、改变训练尺寸，达到整体更逼真的效果，非常欢迎您在评论里留言。

modelVersions.name: v1.5
modelVersions.description: Reconstructed the model after changing the text of the image recognition
